column2: Triggers a province event that allows you to choose a colonial policy.
Triggers a province event that allows you to choose a colonial policy.
This event will clear all colonial policy modifers for your nation.
We must decide how to govern our colonies. Indirect rule prevents colonial migration. Wheras Settlement allows colonial migration to our colonies. You cannot mix and match these.
This event will automatically add your colonial policy modifers to your new colonies.
